sources.title: The Strangler (1963)
sources.description: Victor Buono portrays a serial killer. The .mkv (Matroska) file is the uploaded file. Download it if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC). Update Now there is available an alternate version of a segment near the beginning of the film. (The_Strangler--alt.ogv) Copyright status In the opening credits we see: "COPYRIGHT MCMLXIII by ALLIED ARTISTS PICTURES CORPORATION." Since the date of copyright was 1963, a copyright renewal was required after 28 years.Â  However, there is none to be found. This film is in the public domain.

sources.title: The Strangler of Blackmoor Castle
sources.description: Title: The Strangler of Blackmoor Castle Summary: A strangler is loose on a British estate, and he not only strangles his victims but brands an "M" onto their foreheads before he decapitates them. Directed by: Harald Reinl Actors: Karin Dor, Harry Riebauer, Rudolf Fernau Production Company: Central Cinema Company Film (CCC) Release Date: 21 June 1963 (West Germany) Aspect Ratio: 1.66 : 1 A strangler is loose on a British estate, and he not only strangles his victims but brands an "M" onto their foreheads before he decapitates them.

metadata.Plot: A strangler is loose on a British estate, and he not only strangles his victims but brands an "M" onto their foreheads before he decapitates them.
metadata.Writer: Bryan Edgar Wallace, Gustav Kampendonk, Ladislas Fodor
metadata.Actors: Karin Dor, Harry Riebauer, Rudolf Fernau
